channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (23.1)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi stub files.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-in-file-ignores (0.2.2)
item.description: file-level per-file-ignores for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-simple-string-first-arg (0.1.2)
item.description: This Flake8 plugin for checking that first param of callable is simple string.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-bugbear (23.1.14)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-bugbear
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-mock-spec (1.4)
item.description: A linter that checks mocks are constructed with the spec argument
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (23.1.14)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-flask-openapi-docstring (0.1.2)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to enforce OpenAPI docstrings in Flask routes
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bas (0.1.1)
item.description: Flake8 extension that checks for blank lines around (compound) statements.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-docstrings-complete (1.0.4)
item.description: A linter that checks docstrings are complete
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-mock-spec (1.2)
item.description: A linter that checks mocks are constructed with the spec argument
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-requirements (1.7.6)
item.description: Package requirements checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-wagtail-no-serve (0.1.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that enforces not creating custom serve methods in inheritors from Wagtail's Page model
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-to-ruff (0.0.216.dev0)
item.description: Convert existing Flake8 configuration to Ruff.
